text:
A fierce battle started between the deities and the demons.
 Both of them attacked each other with the most destructive weapons.
 But when the army of Chandrachuda began to dominate the fight, the deities fled away and took the refuge of lord Shiva.
 They told Shiva of the number of deities who had been killed while fighting.
title: Battle Between the Deities and the Demons
